artist: Designer: Sudō Reiko; Manufacturer: Nuno Corporation
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons and Rosa Lynn Pinkus
image_copyright: © Nuno Corporation / Feather Flurries, Reiko Sudo, 1993
text: Fascinated by the myriad shapes, colors and luster of feathers, Reiko Sudo designed a pocket fabric that would encase each feather and optimize their weightless quality.  Goose, peacock and guinea hen feathers were inserted by hand into each pocket as the fabric was being woven.
title: Feather Flurries
